author: Predeactor
description: Send your image and shorten your URL with your own subdomain.
short: Shorten your link and send your image through a link.
install_msg: Hello, this cog requi,re an URL from sxcu.net, to add one, go to https://sxcu.net and create a subdomain. Take the URL and use `[p]set api sxcu url,<Your URL>`.
